Name: Dwarf
Description: A sturdy race known for their resilience and craftsmanship.

Name: Elf
Description: Graceful beings with an affinity for magic and the natural world.

Name: Human
Description: Versatile and adaptable, humans excel in a variety of disciplines.

Name: Gnome
Description: Small and inventive, gnomes are skilled in illusions and tinkering.

Name: Halfling
Description: A nimble race, known for their luck and adventurous spirit.

Name: Half-Elf
Description: Born of two worlds, half-elves combine the best traits of their parents.

Name: Half-Orc
Description: Strong and determined, half-orcs are fierce warriors with a savage heritage.
